summary: Tension escalates and violence ensues when a young student unwittingly breaks a non-aggression pact between two rival high schools.
cast: Shun Oguri|Kyôsuke Yabe|Meisa Kuroki|Nobuaki Kaneko|Haruma Miura|Sôsuke Takaoka|Takayuki Yamada|Ryôhei Abe|Shin'nosuke Abe|Ken Aoki|Kentez Asaka|Gô Ayano|Shunsuke Daitô|Kaname Endô|Ken'ichi Endô|Motoki Fukami|Ryô Hashizume|Daisuke Hibari|Wataru Ichinose|Hihio Iwanaga|Hisato Izaki|Yûsuke Izaki|Yusuke Kamiji|Kenta Kiritani|Gorô Kishitani|Yû Koyanagi|Shôichirô Masumoto|Yutaka Matsushige|Kazuki Namioka|Kengo Ohkuchi|Akihiko Sai|Tarô Suwa|Tsutomu Takahashi|Ryô Takano|Suzunosuke Tanaka|Tomoya Warabino|Tôru Yamashina
keywords: hand to hand combat|fistfight|based on manga|roman numeral in title|numbered sequel
title: Crows II
